attachments.text: The latest Tweets from arXiv abstract (@arxivabs). We love <https://t.co/HHqPeqMbku>! :page_with_curl::heart::female-student: #OpenScience We are here on a mission to link paper abstracts because no one like to download PDF on their mobiles!. Earth (for now)
